summary: In 1865, General Gurko Lanen is dictator of "Lichtenburg" in the Balkans. Rightful ruler Zona hopes to get aid from Napoleon III of France. The visiting Count of Monte Cristo falls for Zona... See full summary Â»
cast: Louis Hayward|Joan Bennett|George Sanders|Florence Bates|Lionel Royce|Montagu Love|Ian Wolfe|Clayton Moore|Ralph Byrd|Georges Renavent|Michael Visaroff|Rand Brooks|Theodore von Eltz|James Seay|Henry Brandon|Jack Mulhall|Edward Keane|Ernie Adams|Stanley Andrews|Maurice Cass|Michael Mark|Charles Trowbridge|Ted Oliver|Wyndham Standing|Lionel Belmore|Margaret Fealy|Charles Waldron|George Barrows|Ted Billings|Stanley Blystone|Dick Curtis|Donald Curtis|Franklyn Farnum|Dwight Frye|Lawrence Grant|Chuck Hamilton|Leyland Hodgson|Jerry Jerome|George Lollier|Eric Mayne|Walter McGrail|Robert Milasch|Alberto Morin|Edmund Mortimer|Dirk Thane|Victor Zimmerman
title: El hijo de Montecristo
